name: NetSuite Sales Order - Salesforce Order
description: When there is a new or updated search result for object in NetSuite, update object in Salesforce

code.name: updated_saved_search_result
code.title: New/updated standard records in a saved search
code.description: New or updated search result for Transaction in NetSuite

properties.label: PO Number ID
properties.hint:
Prefix the value with internalid: to pass Internal ID of the record or externalid: to pass External ID of the record.Eg: externalid:50130000000014c.
If no prefix is used, the value will be considered as Internal ID.
properties.name: f_932_custcolr7expensereportponumber

extended_input_schema.name: custom_list
extended_input_schema.label: Transaction custom fields
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the custom fields to be returned in the output datatree. If no fields are selected, 50 custom fields will be retrieved by default.

extended_input_schema.name: custom_segment_schema
extended_input_schema.label: Transaction custom segment fields
extended_input_schema.hint: Describe schema for Transaction 'custom segment' fields

extended_input_schema.name: custom_column_list
extended_input_schema.label: Line item custom fields
extended_input_schema.hint: Select line item custom fields to be retrieved in the output datatree. If no fields are selected, 50 custom fields will be retrieved by default.

extended_input_schema.name: line_item_custom_segment_schema
extended_input_schema.label: Line item custom segment fields
extended_input_schema.hint: Describe schema for 'line item custom segment' fields

extended_input_schema.name: main_line
extended_input_schema.label: Fetch only transactions' main line?
extended_input_schema.hint: If No, will retrieve all transaction line items except main line of transaction object search. If Yes, will return only main line of transaction object search. Leave empty to get all transaction line items, e.g. transaction with 3 line items results in 4 trigger events

extended_input_schema.name: id
extended_input_schema.label: Order ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Salesforce internal ID of Order to update

block.comment: Added retry logic to retry the monitor block 3 times with a 10 second interval in between retries to mitigate timeout errors
